title: Start
body:
Jake: Grandma will take care of the dishes, let's play!

		Jenny: But grandma seems busy and leave the dishes on the table after eating is not a good habit.

		Jake: But then, cleaning dishes is not fun at all, let's just play instead.

		Jenny: Should I help Grandma?

		[[We should not do this. We have the responsibility to help grandma.|HelpGrandma2]]

		[[Sure. I hate do house chores! Let's play and let grandma do the rest.|NothelpGrandma2]]

title: HelpGrandma2
body:
Jenny: This is our responsibility, Jake and grandma is happy with our help too!

		Jake: You are right after all. It is good to see grandma happy with our good deed.

title: NothelpGrandma2
body: Jenny and Jake were scolded by grandma for not helping after lunch.
